official_title: A bill to provide for payments in lieu of real property taxes, with respect to certain real property owned by the Federal Government.

summary.text: Provides for payments to State and local governments in lieu of real property taxes, with respect to real property owned by the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to provide for payments in lieu of real property taxes, with respect to certain real property owned by the Federal Government.
